title: Voice assistant
Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.

_No response_

title: [PR] Require explicit -k API key, add Ollama / Ollama‑Cloud handling, update docs
summary:
Summary:

- Modified compose behavior to remove environment-variable fallback for API keys: authenticated services must be provided an API key via -k/--api-key.
- Added clearer separation between ollama (local, no auth) and ollama-cloud (cloud models via local Ollama client, requires -k).
